title: “Dark, Edgy” - The Drow's Depiction
itunes:title: “Dark, Edgy” - The Drow's Depiction
description:
The Drow, the evil dark-skinned race of elves that dwell deep belo- Let's pump the brakes a second! This week the Halflings are talking about the troublesome Underdark dwellers and how their depiction has changed throughout the years.

If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing it with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram, and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord, or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
